front.title: YANG Data Model for Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) Hardware Offloaded Session

abstract.t: This document defines a extension YANG data model that can be used to manage Hardware Offloaded Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD). This document specially talks about BFD sessions that are offloaded to hardware. The YANG modules in this document conform to the Network Management Datastore Architecture (NMDA).
